sections.heading: and affirmations.Oaths and affirmations may be administered, in all cases whatsoever, by notaries public

sections.text:
64-107.01.Oaths and affirmations.

Oaths and affirmations may be administered, in all cases whatsoever, by notaries public.

SourceR.S.1866, p. 274;Laws 1909, c. 92, § 1, p. 388;R.S.1913, § 5530;C.S.1922, § 4826;C.S.1929, § 65-101;R.S.1943, § 65-101;Laws 1951, c. 207, § 1, p. 768;Laws 1972, LB 1032, § 266;R.S.1943, (1986), § 65-101;Laws 1990, LB 822, § 38;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 40.
